snippet: Dozens of videos posted online in recent years show the work of Tim Samaras, Paul Samaras and Carl Young, the highly respected storm chasers who were killed during a tornado in Oklahoma on Friday.
abstract: Dozens of videos posted online in recent years show the work of Tim Samaras, Paul Samaras and Carl Young, the highly respected storm chasers who were killed during a tornado in Oklahoma on Friday.

headline.main: Videos and Final Tweets From Storm Chasers Killed in Oklahoma
